# CMCalibratedMagneticField

**Structure**

Calibrated magnetic field data and an estimate of the accuracy of the calibration.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CMCalibratedMagneticField
```

## Initializers

- **init()**: Initializes the magnetic field to a set of default values.
- **init(field:accuracy:)**: Initializes the magnetic field to the specified set of values.

## Accessing the Field Values

- **field**: A structure containing 3-axis calibrated magnetic field data. See the description of the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagneticField] structure.
- **accuracy**: An enum-constant value that indicates the accuracy of the magnetic field estimate. See [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy].

## Getting the Calibrated Magnetic Field

- **magneticField**: Returns the magnetic field vector with respect to the device.
- **CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy**: Indicates the calibration accuracy of a magnetic field estimate

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Sendable
